content:
Welcome to the basket!



In a house in the country there lived a man.

On his table there was set a delicious basked holding fruit, fourteen in all, delicious eatables each.

And so all was happy and peaceful in the basket, until one day, a papaya simply vanished. Eaten, some said.

Who would be next?


Sample Role PM:
Welcome to the fruit basket, PLAYERNAME!

You are a Vanilla Town.

You have no abilities.

You win when all opponents of the the town are destroyed.

Please confirm by post or PM.
Laws of the Basket:
1) All decisions come down to a democracy. The moderator gets 14 votes.
2) Please use vote tags to place your votes. Bold tags are also acceptable.
3) Lynches will occur when one player has received the majority of votes. You may post during the twilight period between the hammer and the closing of the thread.
4) If unsufficient votes are made on any player, or a majority of votes have been made to no lynch, no lynch will be made.
5) Nights will last 48 hours.
6) Do NOT quote any private communication from me, nor any mason, scum, or neighbour topics that may or may not exist. You may paraphrase, just don't copy it wholesale.
7) You MAY NOT discuss the game outside of the thread unless your role specifically gives you the ability to do so.
8) Days will last 2 weeks, or until a lynch (or no lynch) has been decided on.
9)
Blue is my color.
Refrain from using it.
10) Inform the mod before going V/LA. I will prod you after 48 hours of inactivity, and then again after 24 hours. At that point, I will be forced to replace you.
11) In the tragic event I drop off the face of the earth, a backup moderator will take my place.
12) In the event a deadline is reached, it will become a no lynch by default.
13) Once you die, you're dead. You are allowed one "bah!" post, but no more than one, and it must contain no game related content.
14) The rules can be arbitrarily changed/added to by one party (me) anytime I am feeling greedy and/or evil.
15) All roles colored
white
are hilariously unfunny jokes by yours truly.
15a)
Because of complaints made to the moderator, I will hereby refrain from making attempts at being funny.

16) Be nice to other fruits, and try to enjoy yourself.

What a great start to the game this has been, if only every townie could post such useful information so early we would roll the scum in no time at all.

ANNOUNCEMENT

There are NO jesters in this game, so we can lynch ANYONE we want without the threat of one showing up.

You're welcome!
